column3: Latest;Siem Reap: The Siem Reap International Airport Gate has cooperated with of the Department of Investigation and Procedure sent three Indian nationals booked on Flight AK-543 (REP-KUL) Malaysia
column6: for visa irregularities (------source------ translates as ‘stolen visas’
column8: or expired).------Police said the three Indian nationals; ACHHA SINGH male
column13: were arrested and handed over to Operation and Investigation Department of Siem Reap. They had been picked up on July 10.
